Package ohos.agp.components.element

Class ImageAnimationElement

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.agp.components.element.Element
      • ohos.agp.components.element.ElementContainer
        • ohos.agp.components.element.FrameAnimationElement
          • ohos.agp.components.element.ImageAnimationElement
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Element.OnLayoutDirectionChangeListener

    public class ImageAnimationElement
extends FrameAnimationElement
implements Element.OnLayoutDirectionChangeListener
    Creates Image animations using element objects.

    Animations defined by the element objects are mainly used as the background of component objects.

    Since:
    7
